00034 int ResponseCallbackReaddir::response(std::vector<std::string> &listing) {
00035   m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00036   uint32_t len = 8;
00037   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++)
00038     len += encoded_length_str16(listing[i]);
00039   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, len));
00040   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00041   cbp->append_i32(listing.size());
00042   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++)
00043     cbp->append_str16(listing[i]);
00044   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00045 }
